content.text: How TO - Hoverable Dropdown
Learn how to create a hoverable dropdown menu with CSS.
content.html: Learn how to create a hoverable dropdown menu with CSS.

content.text: Dropdown
A dropdown menu is a toggleable menu that allows the user to choose one value from a predefined list:
content.html: A dropdown menu is a toggleable menu that allows the user to choose one value from a predefined list:

content.text: Create A Hoverable Dropdown
Create a dropdown menu that appears when the user moves the mouse over an element.
content.html: Create a dropdown menu that appears when the user moves the mouse over an element.

content.text: Step 1) Add HTML:

content.code: Link 1     Link 2     Link 3
content.code_html:
<div class="dropdown">
  <button class="dropbtn">Dropdown</button>
  <div class="dropdown-content">
    <a href="#">Link 1</a>
    <a href="#">Link 2</a>
    <a href="#">Link 3</a>
  </div>
</div>

content.text: Example Explained
Use any element to open the dropdown menu, e.g. a
content.html: Use any element to open the dropdown menu, e.g. a <button>, <a> or <p> element.

content.text: Use a container element (like <div>) to create the dropdown menu and add the dropdown links inside it.
content.html: Use a container element (like <div>) to create the dropdown menu and add the dropdown links inside it.

content.text: Wrap a <div> element around the button and the <div> to position the dropdown menu correctly with CSS.
content.html: Wrap a <div> element around the button and the <div> to position the dropdown menu correctly with CSS.

content.text: Step 2) Add CSS:

syntaxHighlighting.text:
/* The 
container <div> - needed to position the dropdown content */

color: black;  padding: 12px 16px;  text-decoration: none;
    
display: block;
/* Change color of dropdown links on hover */

/* Show the 
dropdown menu on hover */

/* Change the background color of the dropdown 
button when the dropdown content is shown */

syntax_highlighting.text:
/* The 
container <div> - needed to position the dropdown content */

color: black;  padding: 12px 16px;  text-decoration: none;
    
display: block;
/* Change color of dropdown links on hover */

/* Show the 
dropdown menu on hover */

/* Change the background color of the dropdown 
button when the dropdown content is shown */

content.code_html:
/* Dropdown Button */
.dropbtn {
  background-color: #04AA6D;
  color: white;
  padding: 16px;
  font-size: 16px;
  border: none;
}

/* The container <div> - needed to position the dropdown content */
.dropdown {
  position: relative;
  display: inline-block;
}

/* Dropdown Content (Hidden by Default) */
.dropdown-content {
  display: none;
  position: absolute;
  background-color: #f1f1f1;
  min-width: 160px;
  box-shadow: 0px 8px 16px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
  z-index: 1;
}

/* Links inside the dropdown */
.dropdown-content a {
  color: black;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  text-decoration: none;
  display: block;
}

/* Change color of dropdown links on hover */
.dropdown-content a:hover {background-color: #ddd;}

/* Show the dropdown menu on hover */
.dropdown:hover .dropdown-content {display: block;}

/* Change the background color of the dropdown button when the dropdown content is shown */
.dropdown:hover .dropbtn {background-color: #3e8e41;}

syntax_highlighting_data.text:
/* The 
container <div> - needed to position the dropdown content */

color: black;  padding: 12px 16px;  text-decoration: none;
    
display: block;
/* Change color of dropdown links on hover */

/* Show the 
dropdown menu on hover */

/* Change the background color of the dropdown 
button when the dropdown content is shown */

content.text: Example Explained
We have styled the dropdown button with a background-color, padding, etc.
content.html: We have styled the dropdown button with a background-color, padding, etc.

content.text: The .dropdown class uses position:relative , which is needed when we want the dropdown content to be placed right below the dropdown button (using position:absolute ).
content.html: The .dropdown class uses position:relative, which is needed when we want the dropdown content to be placed right below the dropdown button (using position:absolute).

content.text: The .dropdown-content class holds the actual dropdown menu. It is hidden by default, and will be displayed on hover (see below). Note the min-width is set to 160px. Feel free to change this. Tip: If you want the width of the dropdown content to be as wide as the dropdown button, set the width to 100% (and overflow:auto to enable scroll on small screens).
content.html: The .dropdown-content class holds the actual dropdown menu. It is hidden by default, and will be displayed on hover (see below). Note the min-width is set to 160px. Feel free to change this. Tip: If you want the width of the dropdown content to be as wide as the dropdown button, set the width to 100% (and overflow:auto to enable scroll on small screens).

content.text: Instead of using a border, we have used the box-shadow property to make the dropdown menu look like a "card". We also use z-index to place the dropdown in front of other elements.
content.html: Instead of using a border, we have used the box-shadow property to make the dropdown menu look like a "card". We also use z-index to place the dropdown in front of other elements.

content.text: The :hover selector is used to show the dropdown menu when the user moves the mouse over the dropdown button.
content.html: The :hover selector is used to show the dropdown menu when the user moves the mouse over the dropdown button.
